title: Leading Croatian national team players at FIFA World Cup 2018 , by market value
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market value in million euros for 23 number of Months.
The maximum Market value in million euros 50.0 is found at Month Ivan Rakitic and the minimum is found at Dominik Livakovic where Month is 1.5.
The difference of Market value in million euros between the highest and lowest Month is 48.5.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
Month Ivan Rakitic has the highest Market value in million euros and Dominik Livakovic has the lowest Market value in million euros.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market value in million euros for 23 number of Months.
The maximum Market value in million euros 50.0 is found at Month Ivan Rakitic and the minimum is found at Dominik Livakovic where Month is 1.5.
The difference of Market value in million euros between the highest and lowest Month is 48.5.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market value in million euros in the y axis.
Month Ivan Rakitic has the highest Market value in million euros and Dominik Livakovic has the lowest Market value in million euros.
The second highest Market value in million euros is appeared to be the Month Ivan Perisic.
There is a difference of 48.5 between the maximum Month Ivan Rakitic and minimum Month Dominik Livakovic.
Month Ivan Rakitic is higher than any other Months with value 50.0, followed by Ivan Perisic, and Mateo Kovacic. Down to Month Dominik Livakovic with the lowest value 1.5.
The Market value in million euros has declined over the past 23 Months.
Month Andrej Kramaric, and Marcelo Brozovic have the same Market value in million euros.
The average Market value in million euros in all 23 Months is 15.83.
The Market value in million euros is 364.0 if we add up values of all Months.
